headline: Coterra Energy to Participate at Upcoming Conference
summary: HOUSTON, November 11, 2024--Coterra Energy Inc. (NYSE: CTRA) ("Coterra" or the "Company") today announced that Blake Sirgo, Senior Vice President of Operations, will participate in a fireside chat at the Bank of America Securities-Global Energy Conference. The fireside chat will begin at 2:20 PM ET on Tuesday, November 12, 2024.
